refnamediv.refpurpose: Return the RGB pixel values of a previously opened or created image.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Plugin opcode in image. This opcode is part of the plugin repository and has to be installed separately. The plugin repository can be found here: https://github.com/csound/plugins
Return the RGB pixel values of a previously opened or created image. An image can be loaded with imageload. An empty image can be created with imagecreate.

refsect1.title: Syntax
refsect1.synopsis: ared, agreen, ablue imagegetpixel iimagenum, ax, ay
kred, kgreen, kblue imagegetpixel iimagenum, kx, ky

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: iimagenum -- the reference of the image. It should be a value returned by imageload or imagecreate.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: ax (kx) -- horizontal pixel position (must be a float from 0 to 1).
ay (ky) -- vertical pixel position (must be a float from 0 to 1).
ared (kred) -- red value of the pixel (mapped to a float from 0 to 1).
agreen (kgreen) -- green value of the pixel (mapped to a float from 0 to 1).
ablue (kblue) -- blue value of the pixel (mapped to a float from 0 to 1).
